ROW.DATDSC: select jiaxmc, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'01',1,null)) yf_1, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'02',1,null)) yf_2, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'03',1,null)) yf_3, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'04',1,null)) yf_4, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'05',1,null)) yf_5, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'06',1,null)) yf_6, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'07',1,null)) yf_7, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'08',1,null)) yf_8, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'09',1,null)) yf_9, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'10',1,null)) yf_10, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'11',1,null)) yf_11, count(decode(substr(sjssyf,5,2),'12',1,null)) yf_12 from TAX_JIAXDATA where substr(sjssyf,0,4)='[%DAT1]' group by jiaxmc
